context: Hello! What kind of movies do you like?
Hello I like a good action movie any suggestions?
Of course, Have you seen The Bourne Identity (2002) ?
No I haven't what is it about?

Matt Damon wakes up with no memory of who he is but he's a trained assassin. He has to figure out what's going on and why the government is after him. It's one of the best action movies. Have you seen Taken (2008) ? That's another favorite of mine
okay cool I haven't seen that one either
That's a great one. What's your favorite action movie? That might help me recommend something else
I'm sorry I don't have one Im a free spirit so I like just about everything
resp: Well, okay. The Departed (2006) won the Oscar for best picture, and Inception (2010) was also quite excellent. How do those sound?
